attributes.description: Manufacturing plant that would take the plastic pelits and turn it into other things, from here it would then go to another factory to become acryic fabric.
attributes.title: Shuen Fuh Enterprise Co., Ltd.

attributes.description:
Specializes in the production of coarse gauge knitting fabrics. 
Covering an area of 6, 000 square meters,
Employed over 150 staffs. 
Foundation in 1991
the would become actual clothing rather then furniture apulstry. 
Then shiped to Stefano Worldwide and other stores.
attributes.title: Foshan Huilin Knitting Factory

attributes.description:
I could not find any information of thi company. I couldnt find where it was located, who owned it or wat else it sold. I dont think it got sold to anther company,  think it just went out of buisness. 
Where ever it was, my Grandma bought it. I recied it after she died.
attributes.title: Stefano Worldwide
Modern Trading and Manufacturing Co.
attributes.description:
Established in the year 1998
 Acrylic Fabrics
 As this fabric is uniformly woven, it is ideally used for stitching apparels as well as home furnishing items.

attributes.title: Pat Saul
attributes.description: She bought the sweater about 30 years go. It was her favorite Sweater and she wore it all the time. After she died last year my mom went through her clothing and I ended up with it.

attributes.title: Me
attributes.description: I still have the sweater and ware it all the time. It is one of my favorite sweaters, even though I dont trully kno where it came from.

attributes.title: Oil Drilling
attributes.description: Plastic is made from oil and Saudi Arabia is the biggest producer of oil in the world.

attributes.title: Jamnagar Refinery
attributes.description: Octane is used in gasoline, and there are many uses for the other part of oil.  Ethane and propane are heated and converted into ethylene and propylene.  They are then combined with other chemicals to form a polymer, which is just a long chain of ethylene and propylene molecules.  The polymer is compressed into plastic pellets.  These pellets are sold to manufacturers.
